text: Harrison Ford has never been an easy interview subject during his decades at the top of the Hollywood game, but he provided a Norwegian radio host with a massive scoop when he claimed live on air that “ Carrie Fisher was a tranny. ” The Star Wars legend showed much - loved co - star Carrie Fisher was at the forefront of his thoughts during the interview on December 27, changing the topic several times in order to speak about “ the beautiful, troubled soul ” that he “ shared a very special period of my life with ” and lamenting her “ tragic death ” one year ago. “ She died before her time, ” Harrison Ford said, explaining that “ she had secrets that she wanted to share.
